notes: First Lexus model featuring over 300 technological innovations. Timing belt requires replacement. Designed for smooth operation and silence. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus LS article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Features Skyhook adaptive air suspension and first in-dash CD changer. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus LS article, January 2025 revision.

Timing belt requires replacement. Updated with VVT-i variable valve timing and 5-speed automatic. Features vehicle stability control and front side airbags. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus LS article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Shares platform with Toyota Camry (XV10). Timing belt service critical. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus ES article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Shares platform with Toyota Camry (XV10). Updated with 1MZ-FE engine. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus ES article, January 2025 revision.

Timing belt requires replacement. Shares platform with Toyota Camry (XV20) and Toyota Avalon. Known engine oil gelling issue which could block oil from parts of the engine - regular oil changes critical. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus ES article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Designed by Italdesign Giugiaro. Sport-oriented sedan with rear-wheel drive. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus GS article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Motor Trend Import Car of the Year in 1998. Updated with 5-speed automatic transmission. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus GS article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. V8-powered sport sedan with enhanced performance. Motor Trend Import Car of the Year in 1998. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus GS article, January 2025 revision.

Timing belt requires replacement. Shares platform with Toyota Supra. Luxury coupe designed at Calty Design Research. Features articulating door hinges for easier entry. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus SC article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Shares platform with Toyota Supra. Final years with 5-speed manual transmission availability. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus SC article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Updated with VVT-i variable valve timing. Manual transmission discontinued. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus SC article, January 2025 revision.

Timing belt requires replacement. V8-powered luxury coupe with automatic transmission only. Features articulating door hinges for easier entry. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus SC article, January 2025 revision.
Timing belt requires replacement. Updated V8 with increased horsepower. Luxury coupe with enhanced performance. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus SC article, January 2025 revision.

Timing belt requires replacement. Updated with VVT-i variable valve timing and 5-speed automatic transmission. Significant power increase to 290 hp. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus SC article, January 2025 revision.

Timing belt requires replacement. First luxury crossover SUV, pioneering the segment. Shares platform with Lexus ES/Toyota Windom (XV20). Highly successful model that became best-selling Lexus shortly after introduction. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus RX article, January 2025 revision.

Timing belt requires replacement. Body-on-frame construction shared with Toyota Land Cruiser (J80). Full-time four-wheel drive with solid front and rear axles. Features electronic locking differentials and seats seven passengers. Introduced to avoid potential US trade tariffs on luxury imports. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lexus LX article, January 2025 revision.
